title: Spitting Fans, Cheesy Attacks after Crash Cannot Stop Van der Poel’s One-Man Wrecking Crew
content:
Van der Poel outmuscles Pedersen and Ganna in chaotic E3 Saxo Classic that included 'unsporty' tactics and idiot fan behavior: 'We solved it quite well.'

Read the full article at Spitting Fans, Cheesy Attacks after Crash Cannot Stop Van der Poel’s One-Man Wrecking Crew on Velo.
author: ahood
